title: IGNITE-15407 Fix PK flag ordering in SQL AST traverse
body: This patch fixes a bug in the `SqlAstTraverser`. It incorrectly handled info about PK in cases of changing order of tables.

title: IGNITE-15388
body:
This patch includes the following changes: 

* Azure-storage-blob version update (to 12.13.0) and its dependencies (considering the dependency graph).
* Removed "removeContainer" method - it is never called because "afterTestsStopped" is called on a separate instance and ipfinder is always null there.
* Removed unnecessary imports (com.nimbusds.oauth2.sdk.util.URLUtils.CHARSET) and reworked the bunch of code in which it was involved.
* Fixed incorrect comparison of error codes in the "unregisterAddresses" method.

The test was checked in a separate (from Ignite) project to make sure all required dependencies were included.

title: research
removing MULTI_THREADED from H2 options
body:
The support for MULTI_THREADED has been removed in H2 v1.4.200:
https://github.com/h2database/h2database/releases/tag/version-1.4.200

If a H2 v1.4.200 is on classpath, it will crash Ignite:
Caused by: org.h2.jdbc.JdbcSQLNonTransientConnectionException: Unsupported connection setting "MULTI_THREADED" [90113-200]

It's due to hardcoded DB_OPTIONS:
https://github.com/andyglick/apache-ignite/blob/master/modules/indexing/src/main/java/org/apache/ignite/internal/processors/query/h2/IgniteH2Indexing.java#L202

The fix is to either remove MULTI_THREADED argument or to add IGNORE_UNKNOWN_SETTINGS=TRUE

title: IGNITE-15293 Allow the TopHistorySize to be set below the default size
body:
This PR allows the TopHistorySize to be set below the default size(1000).
If TopHistorySize is set to less than the default size, it simply prints a warning message.
If TopHistorySize is set to 0 or less, it is set as default size.

title: IGNITE-15274: Use workDir instead of storagePath for client nodes
body:
If `DataStorageConfiguration#getStoragePath()` is set for client nodes (in case of shared between client and server nodes config) then, currently, client node fails to start because of the unexisting path.

Ignite should use `workDir` for client nodes.

title: IGNITE-14999v3 : Support dynamic restoration of encrypted snapshots.
body:
This PR extends 'static' encrypted snapshots #9269. 

The new general features are: 

1. Dynamic restoration of encrypted snapshot on a running node ( `IgniteSnapshotManager#restoreSnapshot()` )
2. Validation of encrypted snapshot ( `IgniteSnapshotManager#checkSnapshot()` )

Same master key is still required.

title: IGNITE-15256 Java Thin: Fix ClassNotFoundException on service call after failover
body:
Clear thin client caches when cluster connection is lost.

The root cause of the issue is that client believes that server nodes preserve registered user types after reconnect, however, it could be the case that server nodes lose this information (e.g. full cluster restart with clean up of working dirs). This leads to ClassNotFoundException.
